Text: Somebody, somewhere, needs to open up their seed throttle please!
3 seeds?  I don't think so.  I know I'm one of them!  I am upping as fast as 4MB/sec, but only pulling in 45KB/sec!

Unfortunately, this has audio problems.  Every time something loud occurs in the film, the sound cuts out completely.

Bummer.

You must be doing something wrong...

I watched it with VLC player, and noticed no audio drop-outs at all.
Is there any way people could rip the two commentary tracks and send them to me? I can't seem to find them elsewhere online anywhere...
